name: Vile Doktor
description:
Take on the role of the mysterious plague doctor, Dr. Wyte, to try and beat back the the denizens of the a shadow realm known only as "The Vile."


Keyboard / Mouse Controls

W,A,S,D (Arrow Keys) — Move
LMB — Attack
RMB — Jump
Mouse (left/right) — Camera Rotate
ScrollWheel — Camera Zoom
Esc — Exit/Quit

Xbox Gamepad Controls

Left Stick — Move
Right Stick — Camera Rotate/Zoom
X — Attack
A — Jump
